1.「これは 汗顔の至り……。| はなはだ 遺憾ではありますが どうやら| 我が党の: It is with great regret that I have to admit|that our party has lost.

2.「この件につきましては 厳粛に受け止めますが| しかしながら ある意味で この挫:
We take this matter with the utmost|seriousness, however, in a way it is not too|much to say that this setback is to be|
|expected.

3.「今 ここで 私が倒れることにより| 儀式は 完成へと導かれるでしょう。| 私の: My fall here and now will bring the ritual to|completion. My hope will soon be fulfilled!

4.「……というわけですので 私は| これにて 粛々と舞台を去りますが| 真の恐怖は: So with that, I will leave the stage in a|solemn manner, but the true horror begins now.

5.「どうか 辛味の 今後の躍進に| ご期待ください！| ご静聴 ありがとうございま: Please keep your eyes peeled for more great|things to come from Pungent Taste! Thank you|very much for your attention!

8.獄辛党の党首マスター・ドーは 消え去った。|<cs_pchero>は ガラシの塔: Spicy Party Leader Mustardo disappeared.|<cs_pchero> left Garashi Tower.
